snippet: A South Korean nuclear inspector on a mission for the United Nations was killed, and a Slovakian inspector was injured, when their car overturned.
abstract: South Korean nuclear inspector is killed, and a Slovakian inspector is injured, after their car overturns near a nuclear site southwest of Tehran; men were both part of the mission to Iran by the International Atomic Energy Agency. (M)1
lead_paragraph: TEHRAN -- A South Korean nuclear inspector on a mission for the United Nations was killed, and a Slovakian inspector was injured, when their car overturned on Tuesday near a nuclear site southwest of Tehran, semiofficial Iranian media reported. The International Atomic Energy Agency, the United Nations nuclear watchdog, had no immediate comment on its Web site about the accident, which occurred near the Arak heavy-water plant.

headline.main: Iran: Nuclear Inspector Killed in Crash
